title: Provided further that, while giving permission for phased implementation of CDS, the incentive FSI as per Table-B shall be first released as per the area of the plot under a given phase and the balance incentive FSI shall be released while giving approval to the last phase
clause_text: Provided further that, while giving permission for phased implementation of CDS, the incentive FSI as per Table-B shall be first released as per the area of the plot under a given phase and the balance incentive FSI shall be released while giving approval to the last phase.
